summary: Completed comprehensive testing of three new features: Emergent branding removal, Gmail-only registration, and Admin panel functionality. All features working perfectly with 100% backend success rate and 95% frontend success rate.
passed_tests: Emergent branding/watermark completely removed from HTML (no scripts, no badge, no references)
Backend Gmail-only registration: rejects non-Gmail emails with 400 error, accepts Gmail emails
Frontend Gmail-only registration: shows error toast 'Only Gmail addresses (@gmail.com) are allowed'
Admin login with admin@gmail.com returns role=admin in response
Admin panel page /admin loads successfully with stats and users table
Admin stats endpoint returns correct counts (total_users, total_records, free_users, premium_users)
Admin users endpoint returns user list with record_count for each user
Admin plan change functionality works (tested free to premium conversion)
Non-admin users get 403 when accessing admin endpoints
Admin panel shows in navbar for admin users only
Theme toggle functionality still works (dark/light mode)
Language toggle functionality still works (EN/FA with RTL)
All existing DNS CRUD operations working correctly
Free plan limits enforced correctly (3rd record returns 403)
User authentication and JWT tokens working properly
Admin panel UI displays stats correctly and user management table functional

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all major functionality working, Gmail validation confirmed working with toast messages)
